Metadata.desc: Download and customize Sigmally mods with SigModz. Get the latest SigMod and SigFixes extensions for enhanced gameplay, performance boosts, macros, themes, and more. Easy installation and regular updates.

sigmod.title: SigMod Client
sigmod.desc: Custom mod menu, automation, UI tweaks

Footer.text: © 2025 Sigmally Modz. Not affiliated with Sigmally.

hero.title: Sigmally Modz
hero.sub: Take Sigmally to the next level — faster gameplay, smarter tools, and full control at your fingertips.

what.title: What’s Sigmally?
what.desc: Sigmally is a private server-based agar.io-style game. Fast-paced, competitive, and accessible in-browser, it’s built for players who want simplicity and enjoyable physics. Eat pellets, grow by consuming other players and dominate the leaderboard.

why.title: Why
why.desc: Sigmally Modz gives you deeper control over the game. Whether you’re a casual or competitive player, the mods help with macros, multibox tools, smoother visuals and customization. Everything is designed to boost performance and gameplay comfort.

sigmod.title: SigMod
sigmod.desc: SigMod enhances your overall Sigmally experience with powerful features like macros, custom themes, advanced settings and more. Designed for smoother gameplay and smarter control, it gives you the tools to play your best.

sigfixes.title: SigFixes
sigfixes.desc: SigFixes rewrites major parts of the Sigmally client, improving performance, stability and precision. It eliminates lag spikes, allows multiboxing and adds options like draw delay, custom opacity, name scaling and much more.

questions.question: Are tampermonkey and the userscripts safe?
questions.answer: Absolutely, because who wouldn’t trust installing random scripts from the internet to improve their game, right? But seriously — Tampermonkey is a well-established tool used by millions, and our userscripts only tweak your game experience without any funny business. There are also reviews on the script pages. So yeah, it’s safe. Use with confidence.

questions.question: Do I need both SigMod and SigFixes?
questions.answer: No, but using both gives the best performance and customization. They're designed to work together.

questions.question: Is SigMod and SigFixes allowed in Sigmally?
questions.answer: Yes. SigMod is approved by the owner of Sigmally and widely embraced by the community. Both mods are fully accepted.

questions.question: Can I uninstall the mods anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, just disable or remove them from your userscript manager.

questions.question: Will SigMod make me a pro gamer overnight?
questions.answer: If only! SigMod can make gameplay smoother and easier, but it won't do your skills or reflexes for you. Practice still required.

community.title: Community
community.desc: Sigmally Modz has a Discord server — not the most lively place, but perfect if you’ve found a bug, need help, or just want to ask “why is this broken?” at 3AM. Support lives there (sometimes).

Hero.title: SigMod Client
Hero.sub: Upgrade your Sigmally experience with advanced macros, tag-based teams, UI control, and full in-game customization.

macros.title: Macros & Automation
macros.desc: Streamline gameplay with programmable hotkeys, customizable mouse macros, auto‑respawn, and automated daily‑coin collection.

party.title: Party & Tag System
party.desc: Assign 3‑letter tags to teammates with real‑time minimap tracking, private chat channels, and precision pings.

customization.title: Full Customization
customization.desc: Personalize every aspect—modify UI themes, fonts, layouts, and keybindings in a unified in‑game mod menu.

WhySigMod.title: Why Choose SigMod?
WhySigMod.desc1: SigMod upgrades the Sigmally client with smart automation, visual customization, and full UI control. Set macros, adjust layouts, manage hotkeys, and tweak visuals—all inside a clean mod menu. Switch themes, save names, and take screenshots with ease.
WhySigMod.desc2: Stay in sync with teammates using a live tag system: chat privately, send pings, and track friends on the minimap. View real-time stats, manage your friend list, and fine-tune chat visibility, colors, and keybinds.
WhySigMod.performance: Want even better performance? Combine SigMod with

list.title: Macros & Automation
list.summary: Automate every move — keybinds, tricksplits & mouse macros
list.details: Bind keys for advanced actions like rapid feed, double/triple/quad splits, and tricksplits. Create mouse macros for left/right click behaviors. Configure split sequences with precise delay settings and feed speeds. Toggle settings like names, skins, or respawn with a key — all fully customizable.

list.title: Party & Tag System
list.summary: 3-letter tags, minimap tracking, pings & private party chat
list.details: Assign yourself a tag (up to 3 characters) to form private teams. Members are tracked on the minimap, listed in a party panel with name and score, and can send precise pings. The party chat allows for secure communication, isolated from public chat. You’ll also see who sent which ping by tag index.

list.title: Menu Customization
list.summary: Themes, fonts, layout, tabs, borders, and input styling
list.details: Personalize your UI with themes, rounded corners, background images, and custom input borders. Hide unwanted elements like Discord or language buttons. Customize tab order, spacing, shadows, and switch between preset layouts for a fully personalized experience.

list.title: Visual Game Settings
list.summary: Tweak map colors, opacity, cell styling and fonts
list.details: Adjust color and transparency of key game elements like the map, border, food, and cells. Replace in-game images such as viruses or map backgrounds. Choose different fonts, show/hide player names and skins, apply text outlines, and toggle visual overlays like grid and border.

list.title: Gallery & Screenshots
list.summary: Capture moments & manage your game gallery
list.details: Assign a keybind to instantly take a screenshot in-game. Browse your image collection in the Gallery tab. Each image includes timestamp, delete, and download options. Easily manage or clean your gallery in one place.

list.title: Name Tools & Color Effects
list.summary: Save names, use generators, gradients & symbols
list.details: Access nickname generators from popular sites (NickFinder, Tell.wtf). Save your favorite names for one-click copying. Create stylish names with special characters and design vibrant name colors using gradients and two-tone effects. Quick delete or reuse features built in.

list.title: Friends & Mod Profile
list.summary: Add users, chat privately & manage your mod identity
list.details: Add and chat with friends using username or Discord login. See online status, tag, server, and more. Use filters and search to find users. Customize your mod profile with avatar, bio, status, and color highlights. Accept/decline requests and toggle public visibility options.

list.title: Stats & Quick Access Panel
list.summary: Track gameplay and toggle key settings instantly
list.details: The Home tab shows stats like time played, top mass, and total deaths. The quick access panel lets you toggle Mass, Grid, Border, Jelly Physics, Auto-Respawn, Coin Claim and more — right from the menu without digging through settings.

list.title: Chat System Overhaul
list.summary: Custom mod chat with tabs, keybinds & full control
list.details: Switch between Party and Main chat via tabs. Messages update live using websocket interception. Use keybinds to send your location, toggle blur, enable time tags, or enable compact mode. Customize text, background, and full theme color including transparency.

list.question: What are the core features of SigMod?
list.answer: SigMod includes a fully customizable mod menu, powerful macros and automation tools, a party & tag system, live in-game stats, and a modern chat, name, and friend system — all integrated to enhance your Sigmally gameplay.

list.question: What customization options does SigMod offer?
list.answer: You can change themes, fonts, layout spacing, border radius, name colors (including gradients), UI opacity, menu visuals, game colors, and toggle dozens of visual settings. It also supports deathscreen tweaks, skin overrides, and background presets.

list.question: What is the tag system?
list.answer: The tag system lets you assign a 3-letter code to create a party with teammates. You can track each other on the minimap, chat in a private party channel, send pings, and view scores in a shared party panel with member names and tag indexes.

list.question: How does the friend system work?
list.answer: You can log in to create a mod profile and add other players as friends. View profiles, roles, online status, server info, and chat with them directly. Friend requests, search, settings, and profile customization (avatar, bio, status) are all included.

list.question: How do I open the SigMod menu?
list.answer: Press the V key or click the gear icon in the top-right corner of the game to open the mod menu. It includes tabs for Macros, Themes, Gallery, Friends, and more.

list.question: Can I customize hotkeys and macros?
list.answer: Yes. SigMod includes advanced keybinding tools for feeding, splitting, tricksplits, and more. You can also assign mouse macros, configure linesplit behavior, set rapid feed speed, and bind UI toggles like menu, names, or autorespawn.

list.question: Does SigMod affect game performance?
list.answer: SigMod adds many features but is optimized to stay lightweight. For better framerate or reduced lag, install SigFixes — which patches performance bottlenecks in the base Sigmally client.

list.question: Can I take and manage screenshots?
list.answer: Yes. Use a custom keybind to capture in-game screenshots instantly. View them by date in the Gallery tab, and download or delete them with one click.

Community.title: Join the Community
Community.text: Need help, found a bug, or want to share your custom macros? Join the Discord and connect with other SigMod users.

Hero.title: SigFixes
Hero.sub: Enhance Sigmally's core with ultra-smooth performance, precise input, and advanced multibox control.

performance.title: Boosted Performance
performance.desc: Replaces the rendering engine with WebGL, removing lag spikes and improving FPS for ultra-smooth gameplay.

multiboxing.title: Flawless Multiboxing
multiboxing.desc: Advanced multibox tools with One-tab mode, respawn blocking, vision merging, and customizable outlines.

input.title: Precision Input
input.desc: Reduces input delay and improves control accuracy—especially powerful when using macros or split strategies.

WhySigFixes.title: Why Choose SigFixes?
WhySigFixes.desc1: SigFixes replaces the default rendering engine with a custom WebGL canvas for buttery-smooth visuals and minimal input delay. Lag spikes? Gone. Performance drops? Fixed.
WhySigFixes.desc2: It’s built for competitive play, especially when multiboxing. Enjoy responsive controls, optimized merging, and smart camera behavior that gives you the edge.
WhySigFixes.combo: ? Pair both for the ultimate experience.

list.title: WebGL Performance
list.summary: Replaces the canvas with high-speed WebGL rendering
list.details: SigFixes eliminates lag spikes by replacing the game's canvas with a fully optimized WebGL renderer. This allows smoother gameplay, better framerates, and consistent performance across all devices—even when multiboxing or recording.

list.title: Accurate Input
list.summary: Less delay between your input and movement
list.details: Experience real-time response when moving, feeding, or splitting. SigFixes reduces latency and improves precision for all mouse and keyboard actions. Every move feels sharper and more controlled, especially in high-speed fights.

list.title: Advanced Multiboxing
list.summary: One-tab control, vision merging, respawn handling
list.details: Control multiple instances from a single tab. Choose your vision merge method, customize outlines, colors, and respawn logic. Enable flawless merging, block cluster respawns, and optimize the setup for 2+ tabs with ease.

list.title: Draw Settings
list.summary: Tweak draw delay, cell outlines, camera & zoom
list.details: Set custom draw delay to balance visuals vs performance. Toggle cell outlines, set your skin URL, choose camera behavior (Natural, Instant), and fine-tune zoom speed and auto-zoom toggle for a responsive experience.

list.title: Visual Tools
list.summary: Opacity, glow, skins, jelly physics and grid lines
list.details: Adjust the visibility and behavior of your cells, skins, pellets, or glow. Enable/disable jelly physics and overlays like lines between cells and cursor. Highlight unsplittable cells with custom colors and opacity.

list.title: Theme Customization
list.summary: Pick your theme color and control UI visuals
list.details: Select your own theme color and apply it across the mod. Make the UI match your personal style, from color accents to visual effects like rainbow borders and map backgrounds.

list.title: Game Behavior Tweaks
list.summary: Pushsplit delay, XP score split, aftersplit movement
list.details: Configure how the game behaves after splits, including when movement starts, how pushsplits behave, and how XP and score are shown. These fine-tuned options make competitive movement easier to master.

list.title: Camera Control
list.details: Adjust the way your camera moves: instantly, naturally, or smoothly. Control the spawn camera's behavior, zoom interpolation, and speed to match your preference or setup.

list.title: Text Rendering
list.summary: Font size, weight, outline and clan display
list.details: Edit the name/mass scale, toggle bold text, apply outlines, and hide or show clans. Perfect for minimal setups or high visibility during chaotic moments.

list.question: What is SigFixes?
list.answer: SigFixes is a performance patch for the Sigmally client. It replaces the rendering engine with a WebGL canvas, making the game faster, smoother, and more responsive—especially during multiboxing or competitive play.

list.question: Does SigFixes affect visuals?
list.answer: By default, SigFixes looks identical to the base client. However, it includes many new settings for advanced players—such as skin overrides, cell opacity, text scaling, glow toggles, and unsplittable cell outlines.

list.question: Is SigFixes compatible with SigMod?
list.answer: Yes. SigFixes is fully compatible with SigMod. You can use both together to get all the advanced features of SigMod and the smoother, low-lag performance from SigFixes.

list.question: Can I multibox better with SigFixes?
list.answer: Yes. SigFixes is built for multiboxing. It supports One-tab control, vision merging (Flawless, Latest, None), spawn blocking, tab outlining, and more—all with reduced input delay and better tab sync.

list.question: How do I install SigFixes?
list.answer: Install the Tampermonkey or Violentmonkey extension (only one). Then go to chrome://extensions or edge://extensions and enable Developer Mode. After restarting your browser, install the SigFixes userscript from its official source.

list.question: What camera settings can I change?
list.answer: You can toggle between Default or Natural camera style, set movement to Instant or Smooth, control zoom speed, and enable Auto-zoom and camera tracking when spawning.

list.question: What does the 'draw delay' setting do?
list.answer: Draw delay controls how frequently the game canvas updates. Higher values look smoother but can cost performance. Lower values boost performance but reduce visual fluidity. It’s fully customizable.

list.question: Can I adjust text and name display?
list.answer: Yes. SigFixes allows you to change name and mass scale, toggle bold fonts, control opacity, show/hide clans, and modify outline thickness for improved readability or minimal UIs.

Community.title: Join the Community
Community.text: Need help, found a bug, or want to share your custom macros? Join the Discord and connect with other SigFix users.

QuickGuide.title: Quick Guide
QuickGuide.note: Note that this page isn't as detailed as the full guide.

tampermonkey.title: Install Tampermonkey
tampermonkey.desc: Install the userscript manager required to run SigMod and SigFixes.

developermode.title: Enable Developer Mode
developermode.desc: Follow the steps in the pictures below. Restart your browser enabling the developer mode.

sigmod.title: Install SigMod
sigmod.desc: Adds macros, customization, party tags, and more.

sigfixes.title: Install SigFixes
sigfixes.desc: Boost FPS, reduce lag, enable multiboxing.

play.title: Play Sigmally
play.desc: Everything is ready now. Time to play.

Overview.title: Getting Started
Overview.desc: Welcome to SigModz. This guide walks you through installing both SigMod and SigFixes — the two core mods that take your Sigmally experience to the next level. Expect smoother performance, full control, and powerful tools.
Overview.access: In just a few steps, you'll unlock access to smart macros, FPS boosts, visual tweaks, advanced settings, and more — all seamlessly integrated into your game.

UserscriptManager.title: Install a userscript manager
UserscriptManager.desc: To install and use scripts on websites, you need a userscript manager.
UserscriptManager.instruction: In this guide, we'll use Tampermonkey. Click below to go to the download page for your browser.
UserscriptManager.installed: Once installed, you’ll be ready to add userscripts like <SigMod>SigMod</SigMod> and <SigFixes>SigFixes</SigFixes> in the next step.

DevMode.title: Enable Developer Mode
DevMode.desc: Tampermonkey requires Developer Mode enabled to function properly and allow installation of userscripts like SigMod and SigFixes.

chrome.title: Instructions
chrome.desc: To use Tampermonkey with Chrome, you need to enable 'Allow User Scripts' in the extension settings. This lets it run custom scripts like SigMod and SigFixes.
steps: Click the puzzle icon in your browser’s toolbar.
Click on the 3 dots next to the Tampermonkey extension.

opera.title: For Opera
steps: Click the cube icon (Extensions) in your browser’s toolbar.
At the top right, toggle 'Developer Mode' to ON.

edge.title: For Edge
steps: Click the puzzle icon (Extensions) in your browser’s toolbar.
In the left sidebar, enable 'Developer Mode'.

firefox.title: For Firefox
steps: Firefox does not have a developer mode option. You can skip this step.

default.title: Browser Instructions
steps: Check your browser’s documentation for how to enable Developer Mode.
If you're using a Chromium-based browser, follow the steps shown in the images.

note.label: Note:
note.text: After enabling Developer Mode, restart your browser to ensure Tampermonkey works correctly.

SigMod.title: Install SigMod
SigMod.desc: Now that you have installed a userscript manager, it's time to install SigMod. SigMod adds core features to your game: macros, custom themes, advanced settings and more.
SigMod.popup: Click below to install SigMod. In the opened window you have to click the Install button.
SigMod.after: After installing, SigMod will automatically run on Sigmally. You can customize it anytime in the in-game settings. If you want to find out more about SigMod, you can check it out <link>here</link>.

SigFixes.title: Install SigFixes
SigFixes.desc: Sigmally Fixes rewrites a large portion of Sigmally's client, making it much faster and smoother. Made by yx.
SigFixes.features: SigFixes includes plenty of settings for advanced players like one-tab multiboxing, outlining unsplittable cells, custom draw delay, text size, skins, and opacity.

End.title: You're All Set 🎉
End.desc: SigMod and SigFixes are now installed — giving you the smoothest, most customizable Sigmally experience possible. Explore all features, fine-tune your setup, and enjoy playing at your highest level.

FAQPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions

installMods.question: How to install the mods?
installMods.answer: Getting started is easy! Just follow our detailed or quick <link>installation guide</link>, and you’ll be up and running in no time.

modsNotWorking.question: I have the mods installed, but they are not working. What should I do?
modsNotWorking.answer: If your mods aren’t working despite being installed, the most common issue is that developer mode isn’t enabled in your userscript manager. Check the <link>installation guide</link> for a detailed walkthrough, but in short: Click the puzzle icon in your browser’s top bar, select “Manage extensions” and toggle on developer mode in the top right corner. After that, you have to restart your browser. Enabling this usually fixes the issue instantly. If not, please create a ticket on our discord server and we will try to help you further.

safe.question: Are tampermonkey and the userscripts safe?
safe.answer: Absolutely, because who wouldn’t trust installing random scripts from the internet to improve their game, right? But seriously — Tampermonkey is a well-established tool used by millions, and our userscripts only tweak your game experience without any funny business. There are also reviews on the script pages. So yeah, it’s safe. Use with confidence.

sigmodAndSigfixes.question: Do I need both SigMod and SigFixes?
sigmodAndSigfixes.answer: No, but using both gives the best performance and customization. They're designed to work together.

multibox.question: How to multibox?
multibox.answer: To multibox, install SigFixes. It enables you to run multiple game instances smoothly in one browser tab, letting you control them all at once. For detailed setup, follow the guide here.

uninstallMods.question: Can I uninstall the mods anytime?
uninstallMods.answer: Yes, just disable or remove them from your userscript manager.

coreFeatures.question: What are the core features of SigMod?
coreFeatures.answer: SigMod focuses on customization, macros, automation and an advanced tag system to enhance your Sigmally gameplay.

customization.question: What customization options does SigMod offer?
customization.answer: Change hotkeys, UI themes, game colors, play timer, custom fonts and name settings.

tagSystem.question: What is the tag system?
tagSystem.answer: An advanced system to organize and manage party tags, helping you track friends and teammates easily. It integrates with the minimap and chat, includes a party panel to monitor team scores, and shows teammate info for better in-game coordination.

friendSystem.question: How does the friend system work?
friendSystem.answer: Easily add, manage, and track friends in-game to stay connected.

openMenu.question: How do I open the SigMod menu?
openMenu.answer: Open the mod menu by clicking the gear icon in the game UI or pressing the "V" key on your keyboard.

customHotkeys.question: Can I customize hotkeys and macros?
customHotkeys.answer: Yes! SigMod lets you fully customize hotkeys and mouse macros to suit your playstyle and improve your efficiency.

performance.question: Does SigMod affect game performance?
performance.answer: SigMod is designed to be lightweight and focuses on customization rather than performance improvements. For performance boosts, use SigFixes.

sigfixes.title: SigFixes Specific
sigfixes.note: All options have a ? icon next to them — click those to get detailed explanations of each feature.

improvements.question: What does SigFixes improve?
improvements.answer: SigFixes focuses on improving frame rates, reducing lag spikes, enabling multiboxing, and offering customization like draw delay, custom opacity, and name scaling.

multibox.question: How does SigFixes help with multiboxing?
multibox.answer: SigFixes allows you to run multiple game instances in one browser tab, making multiboxing smoother and easier.

fps.question: Will SigFixes affect my FPS?
fps.answer: Yes, it significantly boosts FPS by optimizing the game’s rendering and reducing lag spikes.

compatibility.question: Is SigFixes compatible with SigMod?
compatibility.answer: Yes, they are fully compatible and designed to work together for the best gameplay experience.

config.question: How do I configure draw delay and other options?
config.answer: You can adjust these settings in the SigFixes mod menu. Each option has a handy "?" icon for detailed info.

FAQPage.needHelp: Still need help? Join our Discord and open a support ticket — we’ll help you out.

tldr.title: TL;DR
tldr.text: I'm Cursed from Germany. I started coding around 2021, got hooked on Sigmally in 2022 and created SigMod as a userscript mod based on RingZero’s original. With support from people like RingZero and yx, both SigMod and Sigmally kept growing.

story.title: The Story
story.intro: Hey, I’m Cursed — the person behind SigMod and this site. Funny enough, Sigmally is what pulled me deeper into programming, even though I had some experience before.
story.sigmodStart: In 2022, I came across Sigmally, joined a top clan, and got hooked immediately. I wanted to improve the game — so I started building my own mod.
story.firstMod: Back then, there was already a solid userscript by RingZero — one of the coolest people in the community. I developed it further, customized it, and uploaded it to Greasyfork. That’s how SigMod came to be.
story.community: It blew up fast. Sure, there was some drama (shoutout to PFMacro) and even a takedown — but most players stood behind me. Without the community, SigMod wouldn’t have come this far.
story.thanks: SigMod isn’t perfect, but I’m proud of it. Thanks to everyone who gave feedback, shared it, or just used it — you’re the reason it keeps going.
story.sigfixes: Huge respect to yx — his mod has made Sigmally way better for everyone.
